articles.title: 'Blockbuster' on Netflix puts chain's last store somewhere in Michigan - Detroit Free Press
articles.description: The first two episodes of the show contain references that suggest the events are taking place somewhere near Detroit.
articles.content:
In real life, the last Blockbuster Video store, the only one to survive in the age of streaming, is in Bend, Oregon.
But in sitcom land, that retro technology honor goes to Michigan.
